On.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ClosingFull
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ClosingFull

Remove.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce

On.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death DontResetOnUnhide

On.Terms: AnimPlay; AnimName Attack; AnimPlayingProps X; IsStatus LeftBladeFX 0
TimerExpired; TimerName CreateLeftBlade; AnimPlayingProps Ready; !ValidateUnit AlarakIsCastingDeadlyChargeCombine
AnimGroupApply; AnimPlayingProps Ready; !AnimPlaying Attack; !AnimPlayingName Spell; !ValidateUnit AlarakIsCastingDeadlyChargeCombine
AnimPlay; AnimName Attack; !AnimPlayingProps X; IsStatus LeftBladeFX 1
AnimPlay; AnimName Spell; IsStatus RightBladeFX 1; ValidateUnit AlarakDoesNotHaveDeadlyChargeChargingSource
AnimPlay; AnimName Spell; HasStatus LeftBladeFX; ValidateUnit AlarakDoesNotHaveDeadlyChargeChargingSource; IsStatus Telekinesis 0

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Spell Spell,D,Start Spell,D Spell,D,End ClosingFull 1.000000
